comment.author: 66757584@N06
comment._content: This is a picture of the Grand Hotel on the Yokohama Bund.   The hotel, as with most other buildings in Yokohama, was destroyed in the Kanto Earthquake in 1923.  The hotel was re-built and the Grand Hotel still stands in the same place.   The water in front of the hotel has been reclaimed and is now Yamashita Park.
